text:
SARA INSTITUTE
Empowering underrepresented communities through purposeful education and research.

REGISTER NOW



We Teach Free

Data Science: R, GitHub, Statistics, & Quarto.
English: Writing, Speaking, Reading, & Listening.
Research: Proposal, Quantitative, & Qualitative Research.











Paying Back To Society

SARA was founded in 2023 for community-rooted data science education & research. Our mission is to enhance the representation of under-privileged communities in data science and mentor them to cultivate creativity and lead impactful lives.
 
More about SARA
